fields.title: Doctor Recommendation
fields.body: Hi [Patient First Name], on a scale of 1-10, would you recommend Dr [Doctor Last Name] to a friend or family member? 1 = Would not recommend, 10 = Would strongly recommend

fields.title: Diagnosis
fields.body: Thank you. You were diagnosed with [Diagnosis]. Did Dr [Doctor Last Name] explain how to manage this diagnosis in a way you could understand?

fields.title: Feedback
fields.body: We appreciate the feedback, one last question: how do you feel about being diagnosed with [Diagnosis]?
